ADVANCED_TARGET_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Analitzador de llarg abast amb cobertura de tot el sistema.

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_DESCRIPTION.message: Protegeix la vostra nau de les altes temperatures durant la reentrada atmosfèrica.

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_HEAVY.description: Will withstand higher pressures than normal Atmospheric Shielding

ATMOSPHERIC_SHIELDING_HEAVY_DESCRIPTION.message: A more capable version of Atmospheric Shields

AUTOPILOT_DESCRIPTION.message: Un ordinador de vol de bord.

CARGO_LIFE_SUPPORT.message: Suport vital de la bodega de càrrega

CARGO_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Permet recollir càpsules de càrrega de l'espai.

DAMAGE_PER_SHOT.description: Tooltip explaining weapon damage per shot

ECM_ADVANCED_DESCRIPTION.message: Sistema avançat de contramesures electròniques, capaç de neutralitzar els míssils més sofisticats.

ECM_BASIC_DESCRIPTION.message: Sistema bàsic de contramesures electròniques, capaç de neutralitzar alguns tipus de míssils.

EMPTY_SLOT.description: Text indicating an empty equipment slot.

FUEL_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Permet recollir combustible d'hidrogen de planetes gegants gasosos.

HULL_AUTOREPAIR_DESCRIPTION.message: Repara automàticament el buc de la nau en cas de danys.

HYPERCLOUD_ANALYZER_DESCRIPTION.message: Analitza el núvol hiperespacial per determinar el destí i l'hora d'arribada o sortida.

LASER_COOLING_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Un sistema de refrigeració millorat per a les armes làser

MININGCANNON_17MW_DESCRIPTION.message: S'utilitza per fer explotar els asteroides rics en minerals.

MININGCANNON_5MW_DESCRIPTION.message: S'utilitza per fer explotar els asteroides rics en minerals.

MULTI_SCOOP.description: A ship equipment: a cargo scoop and fuel scoop combined into one

MULTI_SCOOP_DESCRIPTION.message: Encara que menys efectiu que un col·lector de combustible, permet recollir indistintament combustible o càrrega.

ORBIT_SCANNER.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types, the former scans planet from orbit, the latter from low altitude.

ORBIT_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Scans planet from orbit, for scientific data

ORBIT_SCANNER_GOOD.description: A sensor used to scan planets from high altitude / orbit + model number (that's minimum km altitude)

ORBIT_SCANNER_GOOD_DESCRIPTION.message: Scans planet from orbit, for scientific data, with high resolution and wide aperture lens

RADAR_DESCRIPTION.message: Mostra un mapa 3D de les naus properes.

SHIELD_ENERGY_BOOSTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Fa que l'escut es carregui més ràpidament.

SHIELD_GENERATOR_DESCRIPTION.message: Cada unitat acoblada proporciona protecció extra a la nau.

SHOTS_PER_MINUTE.description: Tooltip explaining weapon fire rate / RPM counter

SURFACE_SCANNER.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types, the former scans planet from orbit, the latter from low altitude. Model manufacturer name is meant to sound like a cheap brand.

SURFACE_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Cartography mapping and geological survey recorder

SURFACE_SCANNER_GOOD.description: A ship equipment that records data of terrain, for cartography mapping/geological survey. Note: Scout Mission module reference and distinguishes between 'orbital' and 'surface' scanner types. Model manufacturer name is meant to be associated with high quality.

SURFACE_SCANNER_GOOD_DESCRIPTION.message: High resolution cartography mapping and geological survey recorder

TARGET_SCANNER_DESCRIPTION.message: Utilitzat per a l'anàlisi remota de l'equipament, estat i càrrega d'altres naus.

THRUSTERS_BASIC_DESCRIPTION.message: Impulsors modificats aprovats per a la vostra nau.

THRUSTERS_BEST_DESCRIPTION.message: Impulsors fets a mida que ofereixen el màxim rendiment i potència possibles.

THRUSTERS_MEDIUM_DESCRIPTION.message: Impulsors optimitzats per millorar el rendiment i la potència.

TOTAL_MODULE_CAPACITY.description: Tooltip explaining module capacity of specific slot

TOTAL_MODULE_WEIGHT.description: Tooltip explaining total equipped weight of specific slot

TRADE_COMPUTER.description: Ship equipment computing profitable commodities to trade between two systems

TRADE_COMPUTER_DESCRIPTION.message: Mostra les mercaderies més profitoses per comerciar entre el sistema seleccionat i l'actual.
